songs.title: You Need To Shut Your Pretty Face
songs.album: A Collection of Rare and Unreleased Recordings
songs.lyrics:
[Verse 1]
Walkin contradiction I can't understand a word you say
Building up the tension playing all your little games
I'm through trying an intervention didn't work
You're standing there smiling saying that's just how you are
Well the way you are is eating under my skin

[Chorus]
You need to get out of my face
You always leave a bad taste when you come around
You seem to like it on the fence
Better pick a side before I knock you to the ground
You're standing in the way
It's time that someone put you in your place
You're standing in the way
If no one will I'll be the one to say
You need to shut your pretty face

[Verse 2]
All you are rambling all I wanna do is drown you out
Or maybe kick the door in
Ruffle feather weigh you down

[Chorus]

[Bridge]
Too much of your mouth
I can't ignore it
Any longer

[Chorus]
You need to shut your pretty face
You need to shut your pretty face
